Name: FTD2
About the game: Fantasy Tower Defence Features... 8 Different tower types with 3 levels for each. 18 Monster Types. Guide monsters by your tower placement. Online Leaderboards. 14 Game modes. Numerous maps. You have the job of saving the town from the hordes of monsters trying to steal the souls of the town's dead. Who is sending then and for what purpose. Use the towers and special skills to defend the town and fight the final intruder to save the world.
Meta Title: FTD2: May 18, 2021, Punto Rojo Studios and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on FTD2? Check out the release date (May 18, 2021), developer insights from Punto Rojo Studios, and a complete game summary.
